CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 27, 1958, pg. 28, reads: "Riding in Style - Thousands of Pittsburghers formed a cheering throng of humanity on Downtown streets Monday afternoon as the second-place Pittsburgh Pirates were honored with a mammoth parade.  Among the Pirates receiving cheers along the parade route were... Bob Porterfield and Ramon Mejias. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Convertible car in parade honoring Pittsburgh Pirates, with baseball players Bob Porterfield and Roman Mejias seated on back, in front of People's First National Bank, Downtown
